name: Serpent
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die before dawn. Any players chosen by your target tonight might also die. One player in the target-chain might become poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Serpent chooses a player. If that player has selected any other players tonight, the might die as well. One player in the chain may become poisoned.

name: Graceful Grim
ability: The Storyteller grants grim access only to vetted spectators.

name: Patter's
ability: The Huntsman selects once per night rather than once per game, but becomes poisoned if they select a minion.

name: Damsel Danger
ability: Minions each receive one Damsel guess, rather than sharing one guess for the team.
